tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Full Mouth Rehabilitation,Cosmetic Filling,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Dr Kruti Dholakia's dental clinic location is the best! It is so convenient to patients as it is on ground floor and on main road itself with parking facility. Whenever I have entered her clinic, I always felt positive and in peace. Excellent ambience! Clinic is neat and clean. It is safe in pandemic. Her staff members are very friendly and warm welcoming. Dr Kruti does excellent dental treatment with honesty and non-commercial approach. Her voice is soothing to mind and soul. It calms us. She speaks sweet and explains every treatment procedure in detail. With her, I always feel I am with my daughter. She is meticulous for the smallest things. I recommend her to my family and friends. She is most loved and respected dentist in Andheri West!

I have an unshakeable trust in Dr. Kruti that she has the right solutions to all of my dental problems.
She makes herself available at the shortest notice and renders her quick and efficient services that has a long lasting effect.
Some of my dental problems have.been removal, of the wisdom tooth,loss of calcium causing tooth breakage such that resructuring of the tooth was a difficult proposition,opening up of fillings,and surface breakage of some tooth.
Here she used to explain,with patience,in simple words the situation and the best options for treatment.
Though it was difficult  for me to take a stand  she 
Understood what was going on in my mind and helped me feel at ease ,putting aside my genuine fear of no new problem requiring me of  an early visit to the clinic.
reply_text: Thank you Radhika aunty for the satisfying review!

review:
I had encountered a fatal bike accident few weeks back and had a broken jaw line.
My entire family visits Belle32 Dental care at Andheri West clinic since last few years and so we immediately called Dr.Kruti as soon as we reached the hospital. After my treatment in the OT, she helped me get the jaw line restored along with getting my teeth aligned for the next few days. Now my smile looks much much better. She did my full mouth restoration job so well that it doesn't seem I had a broken jaw ever!

Her approach towards the treatment is really good as she tries to keep the natural tooth than getting all tooth implants done and that's what is her USP which they call Preventive Dentistry which is so beneficial for a patient.

I wish Dr.Kruti at Belle32 Dental care great success. I will always be indebted to her help at every stage of the treatment.
Cheers!
reply_text: Thank you for the wonderful review! It is our duty to help every patient in their times of need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My husband, Harsh Ajwani went to Dr.Kruti Dholakia‚Äôs clinic called Belle 32, perfectly located in Andheri West jvpd scheme. He described the clinic as very clean, sophisticated and hygienic. Kruti was very professional, made my husband feel at complete ease and avoided being pushy by not suggesting any expensive surgery or add ons to her offerings. My mom in law and I are also visiting her now on and our experience has been fantastic to date. I recommend everyone to go here.
reply_text: Thank you Deepika and Harsh for the wonderful reveiw! It means a lot.

review: I had called Dr Kruti Dholakia today, on a Sunday morning towards severe pain in upper teeth and jaw and right ears. She treated the tooth with painless root canal treatment which sorted your problem. She gave good solution. Her clinic is clean and hygienic. I searched her online and would recommend her to all! Thank you Dr Kruti!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kruti Dholakia performed teeth cleaning for me when my mouth opening was just 1 finger wide. It was very difficult for any dentist to do but she did it accurately and perfectly without giving me pain. Her treatment is fast, which depicts her experience journey in treating patients. Her clinic is neat, clean and hygienic. I highly recommend her to all who read my reveiw! Thank you Dr Kruti to encourage me to quit my tobacco habit!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kruti Dholakia's dental clinic is hygienic, clean and tidy. I am very satisfied with the quality of treatment and it's speed. I approached Dr Kruti with swelling in mouth on upper right back side and severe pain. The pain vanished in the first appointment itself. Dr Kruti was available towards treating my dental emergency on a Sunday afternoon. I highly recommend Dr Kruti Dholakia to all my known people! Thank you Dr!
